The '''Special Kamera''' is a [[gadget]] obtained from the ''[[Perfect Shot]]'' [[World Quest]]. During the [[Five Flushes of Fortune]] event, the [[Kurious Kamera]] is exchanged to obtain it.

It allows the player to take pictures like a normal [[Kamera]], but the printed images have a golden, hazy border added to it.

==Preview==
<gallery>
Special Kamera Preview.png
</gallery>

==How To Use==
Press 'Z' to take an instant picture/screenshot with a golden vignette border.
